isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING FANS - DESCRIPTION - Kysor Engine Fan Controls

svcproc.title: Kysor Engine Fan Controls
svcproc.para: The ECM is used to control the Kysor engine cooling fan. Other fan control components include:

item.para: A Normally Closed (N.C.) Air Conditioning (A/C) High Pressure Switch (228).
An optional engine fan override switch (659).

svcproc.para: The solenoid relay is controlled by the ECM using information from the coolant temperature sensor, retarder solenoid status and A/C high pressure switch.
The optional engine fan override switch allows the driver to disable the control voltage from the ECM and keep the fan turned on.
